    Filtering¶

    gaussian_blur(image[, sigma])

    Multi-dimensional Gaussian filter

    gaussian_laplace(image[, sigma])

    Multidimensional Laplace filter using Gaussian second derivatives.

    percentile_filter(image[, percentile, size])

    The percentile filter is similar to the median-filter but it allows specifying the percentile.

    sobel(image[, axis])

    Sobel edge filter.

    sobel_3d(image)

    Sobel edge filter in 3D

    white_tophat(image[, size])

    Multidimensional white tophat filter.

    black_tophat(image[, size])

    Multidimensional black tophat filter.

    minimum_filter(image[, size])

    Calculate a multidimensional minimum filter.

    median_filter(image[, size])

    Calculate a multidimensional median filter.

    maximum_filter(image[, size])

    Calculate a multidimensional maximum filter.

    morphological_gradient(image[, size])

    Apply gradient filter (similar to the Sobel operator) for edge detection / edge enhancement.

    subtract_background(image[, rolling_ball_radius])

    Estimate background intensity by rolling/translating a kernel.

    binary_invert(binary_image)

    Inverts a binary image

    sum_images(image1, image2[, factor1, factor2])

    Add two images :type image1: NewType(ImageData, ndarray) :param image1: The first image to be added.

    multiply_images(image1, image2)

    Multiply two images :type image1: NewType(ImageData, ndarray) :param image1: The first image to be multiplied.

    divide_images(image1, image2)

    Divide one image by another

    invert_image(image[, signed])

    Inverts the intensity range of the input image, so that the dtype maximum is now the dtype minimum, and vice-versa.

    butterworth(image[, cutoff_frequency_ratio, ...])

    Apply a Butterworth filter to enhance high or low frequency features.

    Next gaussian_blur
